meta.title: One app, all things money
meta.description:
Open a free account in minutes right from your phone,
and make your money go further
meta.keywords: Super app, payments, transfers, international transfers, budgeting and analytics, cards, security

content.title:
One app, all
things money
content.description: From easy money management, to travel perks and investments. Open your account in a flash

content.caption: Everyday essentials
content.title: Send, spend and save smarter
content.description: Make day-to-day spending a breeze with all things money in one place

content.title: Pay and get paid, hassle-free
content.description: Send and request money with a tap, split bills easily with anyone in 200+ countries

content.title: Earn up to 1.95% annual interest, paid daily
Get exclusive Rewards and save as you spend
Cards with style and substance
content.description: Our cards are more than just their good looks. Get instant payment notifications and manage card security in app. Start spending straight away with Google or Apple Pay

content.title: All your accounts, all in one place
No more unwanted subscriptions

content.caption: Investments
content.title: Investments from just $1
content.description: Create your portfolio and start trading with just a few taps. Capital at risk

content.title: Go from cash to crypto instantly
content.description:
Get secure crypto storage and realtime updates so you can supercharge your investments for less. 

Not Regulated. Value can go down. Tax may be payable

content.title: Trade 1,500+ global shares commission-free*
content.description:
* within your allowance. Other fees may apply

Capital at risk

content.title: Buy gold and silver instantly in-app
content.description: Capital at risk, not FCA regulated

content.caption: Travel
content.title: All your travel needs, sorted
content.description: Travel card? Check. Insurance? Covered. Hotels? Say no more. We’re building you a connected trip

content.title: It pays to book with Stays
content.description: Time to get away? Book amazing holiday accommodation all around the world and get up to up to 10% cashback

content.title: Spend abroad like a local at the real exchange rate
Travel in style with  lounge passes for less

content.caption: Lifestyle
content.title: Get a little more in life with Revolut
content.description:
Let us take care of all the added extras, from donations to gifts
for friends and so much more

content.title: Share the love with Revolut gifting
Donate to causes you care about with a tap

content.caption: Security
content.title: End-to-end security
content.description: Get peace of mind with our strong security systems and trusted partners

content.title: We keep your funds safe
content.description: Our disposable virtual cards allow you to make one-off, secure payments. And as an e-money institution (EMI), your money is protected through safeguarding and not by the financial services compensation scheme (FSCS)

content.caption: News
content.title: Updates from our blog
A personal letter from our CEO
The war on Ukraine: our response
Join 20m+ people who already trust us with their money

title.value: How to set up your Revolut Reader

localised.en: How to set up your Revolut Reader

content.title: Choose your plan

items.title: Standard
items.caption: Free
items.description: Whether you're looking to save money spending abroad or sticking to your budget with our built-in budgeting, get more from your money with our Standard account

items.title: Plus
items.caption: £2.99/month
items.description: Give your everyday finances a boost. Get more out of your money for less than the cost of a coffee

items.title: Premium
items.caption: £6.99/month
items.description: Upgrade to a global lifestyle. Get the confidence to spend, invest, and save smarter across the globe

items.title: Metal
items.caption: £12.99/month
items.description: Unlock your money's potential. Make your money work for you with 1.95% interest paid daily on savings, cashback, low-fee crypto and much more

content.caption: What are you waiting for?
content.title: Get the only financial super app

content.description:
© Revolut Ltd 2022

If you would like to find out more about which Revolut entity you receive services from, or if you have any other questions, please reach out to us via the in-app chat in the Revolut app. Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference 900562). Registered address: 7 Westferry Circus, Canary Wharf, London, England, E14 4HD. Insurance related-products are arranged by Revolut Travel Ltd which is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority to undertake insurance distribution activities (FCA No: 780586) and by Revolut Ltd, an Appointed Representative of Revolut Travel Ltd in relation to insurance distribution activities. Trading and investment products are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 832790) is wholly owned subsidiary of Revolut Ltd and is an appointed representative of Resolution Compliance Ltd which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.

We are also registered with the Financial Conduct Authority to offer cryptocurrency services under the Money Laundering, Terrorist Financing and Transfer of Funds (Information on the Payer) Regulations 2017.

Revolut's commodities service is not regulated by the FCA.

Send money to India | Send money to Germany | Send money to Poland | Send money to Australia | Send money to Canada | Send money to Spain | Send money to Italy

Revolut USA | Revolut Spain | Revolut Australia | Revolut Singapore | Revolut Estonia

translations.shared.cookieConsent.description: We’re not talking about the crunchy, tasty kind. These cookies help us keep our website safe, give you a better experience and show more relevant ads. We won’t turn them on unless you accept. Want to know more or adjust your preferences?
translations.shared.cookieConsent.preferences.descrip: We’re not talking about the crunchy, tasty kind. These cookies help us keep our safe, give you a better experience and show more relevant ads. We won’t turn on unless you accept. Want to know more or adjust your preferences?
translations.shared.cookieConsent.preferences.section: Essential cookies help you to access the website and each of its web pages and sub domains, by enabling basic functions like cookie consent. They cannot be disabled.

These allow us to recognise and count the number of visitors to our website, and see how visitors browse our website, so we can improve it where necessary. These also allow us to see what pages and links you have visited so we can provide more relevant ads. We may share this information with other organisations, such as Google, Facebook and LinkedIn, for the same purpose.
translations.shared.cookieConsent.preferences.title: Cookie preferences
translations.shared.cookieConsent.title: Cookies give you a personalised experience

translations.widget.careersApplication.caption.visa: Do you require a visa to work in the desired locations?
translations.widget.careersApplication.diversity.capt: Our company values diversity. To ensure that we comply with reporting requirements and to learn more about how we can increase diversity in our candidate pool, we invite you to voluntarily provide demographic information in a confidential survey at the end of this application. Providing this information is optional. It will not be accessible or used in the hiring process, and has no effect on your opportunity for employment.

translations.shared.junior.consent.description: A Revolut Junior account can only be set up by the parent or legal guardian.{break}If you're not the parent or legal guardian, forward this link to them so they can set up an account for you.
translations.shared.junior.consent.privacy: By pressing "Yes, I am the parent", you acknowledge our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.
translations.shared.junior.consent.privacyIncentive: By clicking "Yes, I am the parent", you allow Revolut Payments UAB to share Junior set up progress and first action with the friend who shared this link and acknowledge our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

translations.shared.junior.form.description: A Junior account designed for kids, controlled by you. Help them build healthy money habits.
